name: Running Cat World
description:
Running Cat world- jungle adventure game is a funny and addictive adventure game that will makes you enjoying.
help the cat to survive and spend fuuny adventurous day with it.
how to protect your cat?
help the running cat to run and collect all the fishes without being killed by monsters and obstacles , just click the screen to make the little cat bypass the obstacle by jumping it,
with Running cat world - jungle adventure game you will spend Exciting moments with little cat in different levels,

you will spend challenging moments in each one.

and The level of difficulty increasing while you going up in levels.
it is an Exciting fun and Amazing challenging adventure game.
Running Cat world is the best running game for you! It has the best fun run game with amazing high quality graphics and music effects.
***How to play***

1. Just tap the screen to jump the cat

2. Collect fishes as many as you can, without being killed by monsters

3. Run to the end of the levels to reach the little cat's home and for higher score to make the cat wins challenge.

***Features***

-Tap the screen to make cat Jump.
-Run and finish all the levels.
-increase the scores by collecting fishes and jumping obstacles
-Have amzing relaxing music and sound effects.
-Have many challenging levels
-make your Mind active with continuing running adventure game
-Great test for your reaction and running skills
-heavy running cat experience: Good adventure game for instant fun!
-Run and finish the levels to unlock next level

Download Running Cat World - jungle adventure Now and make a challenge !

Hope You Enjoy playing this Game

Rate us 5 stars and comment if u enjoy it !

thank's
